name: edit_tasks
description: Create or edit tasks in the in-memory task management system. Can create new tasks or update existing ones. Validates parent relationships and outputs current task list.

function.name: edit_tasks
function.description: Create or edit tasks in the task management system. Each task has an ID, title, description, parent (optional), and status. If a task with the given ID exists, it will be updated with the provided fields (non-provided fields remain unchanged). If no ID is provided or the ID doesn't exist, a new task is created. Parent relationships are validated to prevent circular dependencies.

tasks.description: Array of task objects to create or edit. Each task can have id, title, description, parent, and status fields.

id.description: Task ID (UUID). If provided and exists, the task will be updated. If not provided, a new task will be created with a generated ID.

title.description: Task title/name. Required for new tasks, optional for updates.

target_role.description: role of agent that should pickup the task. Required for new tasks. do not change for in_progress or completed tasks

description.description: Detailed description of the task. Required for new tasks, optional for updates (overrides).

parent.description: ID of the parent task. Must be a valid existing task ID. Creates a hierarchical relationship. Optional field.

status.description: Task status. Valid values: 'not_started', 'in_progress', 'completed', 'cancelled'. Defaults to 'not_started' for new tasks.

response_format.description: Returns a JSON object with 'success' (boolean), 'timestamp' (ISO string), 'tool_name' (string), 'processed_tasks' (array of processed task results), and 'current_task_list' (hierarchical list of all tasks in short format). Error responses include 'error' field with detailed error message.
